Fix virtualbox packer, add libvirt packer

* Add a libvirt target as well

* Use sudo for all shell commands
* Fix virtualbox guest additions build order
* Cleanups to reduce end image size
* Update README how to build and up both for vbox/libvirt

Signed-off-by: Bogdan Dobrelya <bdobrelia@mirantis.com>

ListObserver fixes

ListObserver needs to save emitter data to args. This is because
it saves values, when we re-do connections we need to do them
in the same order as for values. This can be only reliably handled
when we save emitter along with values.
